OMG Your kidding???

Some people. She seemed to have in her mind that we we=
re discovering new frontiers in spirit communication and deliberately leavi=
ng her out.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Ratka 
  To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 9:38 AM
  Subject: Re: =
[EVP-ITC] Someone Ask,





        I never saw and article either and I we=
nt back through the posts. She posted to 3 groups at once so it my have bee=
n one and not the other two. Either way, somehow she woke on the wrong side=
 of the bed. She unsubscribed!

        Regards,

        Frank R.

       =
 --- On Mon, 6/8/09, April Abercrombie <april@...>=
 wrote:


          From: April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostresearch=
.com>
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Someone Ask,
          To: EVP-ITC@y=
ahoogroups.com
          Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 10:35 AM


          T=
here are alot of rumors circulating around. Another source claims to have p=
ictures of him with his arms tied above his head. If this is the case, ther=
e had to have been someone else present at the time.

          I admit, I =
didn't even see you post any article so somehow I missed it.

          ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
            From: SnowfireL@aol. com 
          =
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
            Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 8:0=
7 AM
            Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Someone Ask,


            Ron, I a=
lready sent through the article which said, his hands "were tied behind his=
 back" everyone was too busy looking at the blood he had been hanging a lon=
g time, all the blood was in his legs, and his upper torso was white, is wh=
at one article said, some camera guy was there on the seen his name was Rus=
sell, and he claimed to have seen this type of thing before, I thought Stev=
e or someone would put 2 and 2 together.  Guess not, I guess no one bothere=
d to read what I sent out there. sf






            In a message dated 6/=
8/2009 9:58:47 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time, warrior18eii@ yahoo.com writes:
=



                    His hands weren't tied. All the articles I have seen=
 only state his neck was tied to his genitals. All I can say is good luck t=
o him now!

                    Regards,

                    Frank R.

   =
                 --- On Fri, 6/5/09, SnowfireL@aol. com <SnowfireL@aol. com=
> wrote:


                      From: SnowfireL@aol. com <SnowfireL@aol. c=
om>
                      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Someone Ask,
             =
         To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
                      Date: Friday, J=
une 5, 2009, 5:59 PM


                      Why was he found with his hand=
s tied behind his back, and the noose around his neck and private parts, ho=
w was that an accident?

                      In a message dated 6/5/2009 =
6:55:51 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com wr=
ites:



                        It wasn't suicide, it was accidental:
    =
                    Carradine Death Was Accidental

                       =
 IMDb, June 4, 2009

                        David Carradine died during a =
sex game that went wrong, according to sources in Bangkok, Thailand, where =
he was found dead on Thursday.

                        Carradine's body wa=
s discovered in a hotel suite and local reports suggested he committed suic=
ide. 

                        He was discovered by a maid, naked and hange=
d, but the suggestions his death had a sexual twist were strongly disputed =
by the star's close friend, attorney Vicki Roberts, and his manager Chuck B=
inder, who insisted he died of natural causes. 

                        Bu=
t a statement from Carradine's representative now indicates the actor died =
during a sex act.

                        The spokesperson tells TMZ.com, =
"We can confirm 100 percent that he never would have committed suicide. It =
was an accidental death. Everybody is in shock." 

                        =
Rumours Carradine died attempting auto-erotic asphyxiation- -where victims =
achieve heightened sexual pleasure by restricting their air supply are back=
ed up by a quote a Bangkok police officer gave to British newspaper The Sun=
. 

                        The cop tells reporters, "A rope was attached t=
o his neck and also to his penis". 

                        Rocker Michael=
 Hutchence was rumoured to have died attempting the same sex act in a Sydne=
y, Australia, hotel room back in 1997--although his death was officially de=
clared a suicide.

                        Carradine was in Thailand to sho=
ot the movie "Stretch." He was 72.
                          ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
                          From: SnowfireL@aol. com 
       =
                   To: RTSC@yahoogroups. com ; EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com ; i=
nside_the_box_ rtsc_talk_ radio@yahoogroup s.com 
                         =
 Sent: Friday, June 05, 2009 4:41 PM
                          Subject: [EV=
P-ITC] Someone Ask,


                          The spirit world to talk wi=
th David Carradine,  to see what happened, if someone may have killed him, =
it's hard to believe that he would take his own life, I feel like it was fo=
ul play. sf
